name: LD #34 - Steil Kampf - WebGL
description:
Ludum Dare #34 Team Jam Entry

Game Title: Stiel Kampf

Theme Choice: Growing

Instructions: collect water and compost to grow your vine, water is scattered on the platforms, to get compost you must knock your enemies to the ground and the collect their remains.

Controls:

W - Jump

A - Left

D - Right

Space - Punch

Team:

Jordan Thorpe

Anthony Ruddick

Joseph Adams
